info.brief_description: Cooro and the other from +Anima is going to get very Expansion!
info.description:
Cooro from +Anima is going to get weight gain, Blueberry, and more.

-No mass Gain Weight.
-No Death and Vore
-Blueberry Expansion.
-Weight Gain.
-Body Expansion.
-Transgender (with Breast Expansion only.)
-Magic only.
-Nana, Husky, Senri, and more from +Anima only.
-Fruit Expansion.
-Eating/Drinking only.
